title: Spoiling His Wife Inordinately - Novel Updates
tags: Adopted Protagonist   Army   Drugs   Female Protagonist   First-time Interc**rse   Marriage of Convenience   Modern Day   Soldiers
author: Warm Winter   何所冬暖
description: Hmm, the whole story is triggered by a cucumber. One night, right after she is recognized, the man asks her angrily, “No way have you really forgotten about me!” Scratching her hair, she replies, “I’m so sorry, I suffer face blindness, your face doesn’t ring a bell to me.” The man whispers at her ears, “That night, half a year ago…” Flushing crimson, she cried, “It’s you!” Yup! It’s me in the flesh! Face blindness? No problem at all, let’s see if you can remember me after I spend the rest of your life with you.>
